conversation.content: You are my personal AI assistant with conversation memory. You have access to our previous conversations at startup. Be friendly and engaging, but ALWAYS keep responses short and concise. When asked about previous conversations, refer to your loaded context.
I wanted to talk about something, it's related to my job.
Of course! What about your job do you want to discuss?
I just want you to remember that I work on the jobs right now. I have a job related to visiting AI engineering and also I'm a team leader for AI engineers. Can you remember those?
Absolutely, I'll remember that you're currently working in AI engineering and also acting as a team leader for AI engineers. How can I assist you with your work?
